phones.name: iPhone 7
phones.description: The iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus are smartphones designed, developed, and marketed by Apple Inc. They are the tenth generation of the iPhone.

phones.name: iPhone 11
phones.description: The iPhone 11 is a smartphone designed, developed, and marketed by Apple Inc. It is the 13th generation, lower-priced iPhone, succeeding the iPhone XR.

phones.name: Galaxy S21
phones.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is a series of Android-based smartphones designed, developed, marketed, and manufactured by Samsung Electronics as part of its Galaxy S series. They collectively serve as the successor to the Galaxy S20 series.

phones.name: OnePlus 9
phones.description: The OnePlus 9 and 9 Pro are Android-based smartphones manufactured by OnePlus.

phones.name: Xiaomi Mi 11
phones.description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 is an Android-based high-end smartphone designed, developed, produced, and marketed by Xiaomi Inc. succeeding their Xiaomi Mi 10 series.

phones.name: Redmi Note 10 Pro
phones.description: The Redmi Note 10 is a line of Android-based smartphones as part of the Redmi Note series by Redmi, a sub-brand of Xiaomi Inc.

phones.name: Huawei P40 Pro
phones.description: Huawei P40 is a line of high-end Android-based smartphones manufactured by Huawei.

phones.name: Oppo Find X3 Pro
phones.description: Oppo Find X3 and Find X3 Pro are Android-based smartphones manufactured by Oppo, succeeding the Find X2 and Find X2 Pro.
